com.lehman.ic9

Class ic9engine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lehman.ic9.ic9engine

  • public class ic9engine
extends java.lang.Object
    The IC9 scripting engine based on Nashorn script engine in Java JRE 8 or later.
    Author:
    Austin Lehman

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String version
      ic9 version.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ic9engine()
      Default constructor.
      ic9engine(java.lang.String[] Args)
      Constructor creates the environment, creates the actual ScriptEngine object and runs the init() method.

                 ic9exception,
                 java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
        Default constructor.

        javax.script.ScriptException - Script exception.
        ic9exception - Propagates exception from call to init().
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - Exception

      • ic9engine

        public ic9engine(java.lang.String[] Args)
          throws javax.script.ScriptException,
                 ic9exception,
                 java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
        Constructor creates the environment, creates the actual ScriptEngine object and runs the init() method.
        Parameters:
        Args - is an array of String objects to add to the getScriptEngine call.
        Throws:
        javax.script.ScriptException - Script exception.
        ic9exception - Propagates exception from call to init().
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - Exception

      • eval

        public java.lang.Object eval(java.lang.String FileName,
                             java.lang.String ScriptContents)
        Evaluates the provided JS code and sets the file name to the context for error handling.
        Parameters:
        FileName - is a String with the file name for the script.
        ScriptContents - is a String with the JS script contents.
        Returns:
        An object with a JS object if set.

      • invokeFunction

        public java.lang.Object invokeFunction(java.lang.String FunctionName,
                                       java.lang.Object... args)
                                throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                                       javax.script.ScriptException
        Invokes a function with the provided function name and passed arguments.
        Parameters:
        FunctionName - is a String with the function name to invoke.
        args - is an array of Objects that are the invoked function arguments.
        Returns:
        An Object return value returned from the invoked function.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - Javascript function not found.
        javax.script.ScriptException - Script exception.

      • invokeMethod

        public java.lang.Object invokeMethod(java.lang.Object TheObj,
                                     java.lang.String FunctionName,
                                     java.lang.Object... args)
                              throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                                     javax.script.ScriptException
        Invokes a method on the provided object with the name and passed arguments.
        Parameters:
        TheObj - is an instance of the native object.
        FunctionName - is a String with the method name to invoke.
        args - is an array of Objects that are the invoked function arguments.
        Returns:
        An Object return value returned from the invoked method.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - Method not found.
        javax.script.ScriptException - Script exception.

        Puts the provided global value for the provided key.
        Parameters:
        KeyName - is a String with the key name to set globally.
        Value - is the value to be set for the key.

      • newObj

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> newObj()
                                                        throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                                                               javax.script.ScriptException
        Instantiates a new Javascript object and returns it's ScriptObjectMirror object. This method invokes newJsObject from env.js. If null is provided as the name a generic Javascript object is created and returned.
        Returns:
        A new ScriptObjectMirror as Map String - Object object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - Method not found.
        javax.script.ScriptException - Script exception.

      • newObj

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> newObj(java.lang.String Name)
                                                        throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                                                               javax.script.ScriptException
        Instantiates a new Javascript object and returns it's ScriptObjectMirror object. This method invokes newJsObject from env.js. If null is provided as the name a generic Javascript object is created and returned.
        Parameters:
        Name - A String with the name of the object to create or null.
        Returns:
        A new ScriptObjectMirror as Map String - Object object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - Method not found.
        javax.script.ScriptException - Script exception.

      • isObj

        public boolean isObj(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> NativeType)
              throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                     javax.script.ScriptException
        Java method for checking if the provided Javascript variable is a Javascript object.
        Parameters:
        NativeType - is a Javascript variable to check.
        Returns:
        A boolean with true for Javascript Object and false for not.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - Exception
        javax.script.ScriptException - Exception

      • runTest

        public java.lang.Object runTest()
                         throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                                javax.script.ScriptException
        Shortcut that invokes the test function available within the global scope. This is used to run a test from the command line. This is meant to create an entry point into a script file just for running unit tests.
        Returns:
        An Object with the result of the test function.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - Method not found.
        javax.script.ScriptException - Script exception.

      • setMainArgs

        public void setMainArgs(java.lang.String script,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> args)
                 throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                        javax.script.ScriptException
        Sets the list of arguments provided as the 'mainArgs' list within the script engine for use by the script. Arguments passed from the command line to the script are set here.
        Parameters:
        script - is a String with the script name argument.
        args - is a List of Strings to set as the mainArgs.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - Method not found.
        javax.script.ScriptException - Script exception.

      • getVersion

        public java.lang.String getVersion()
        Gets the IC9 version string.
        Returns:
        A String with the IC9 version.
